evidence.text: Children who require placement in foster care are the most vulnerable members of Oklahoma society. They are found in the four comers of the State; they come from cities, suburbs and rural areas.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: Children who require placement in foster care are the most vulnerable members of Oklahoma society. They are found in the four comers of the State; they come from cities, suburbs and rural areas.

evidence.text: DRS has failed to provide safe and adequate living situations for foster children.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: DRS has failed to provide safe and adequate living situations for foster children.

evidence.text: DRS has placed children in unsafe homes and facilities, with instances of physical abuse, neglect, and severe injury.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: DRS has placed children in unsafe homes and facilities, with instances of physical abuse, neglect, and severe injury.

evidence.text: DRS has moved children through numerous placements, including emergency shelters and foster homes, often without adequate supervision.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: DRS has moved children through numerous placements, including emergency shelters and foster homes, often without adequate supervision.

evidence.text: The foster system has an excessive caseload, high turnover, and inadequate training for caseworkers.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: The foster system has an excessive caseload, high turnover, and inadequate training for caseworkers.

evidence.text: DRS has failed to pay adequate foster care maintenance payments.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: DRS has failed to pay adequate foster care maintenance payments.

evidence.text: DRS has failed to plan for permanent homes and exits from state custody.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: DRS has failed to plan for permanent homes and exits from state custody.

evidence.text: More than 10,000 children of Oklahoma have been removed from their homes by the State.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: More than 10,000 children of Oklahoma have been removed from their homes by the State.

evidence.text: The case is brought by the Named Plaintiffs, nine children in foster care, on behalf of themselves and the more than 10,000 children of Oklahoma who have been removed from their homes by the State.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief and Request for Class Action

add_extracted.value: The case is brought by the Named Plaintiffs, nine children in foster care, on behalf of themselves and the more than 10,000 children of Oklahoma who have been removed from their homes by the State.
